Straight Shot was ready to face anything that got in front of her but, as s=
oon as she got a peek at Nightshift and the others, she knew whatever she d=
id now, had to be done with extreme caution.  Rattrap looks to her with the=
 exact expression on his own face.  

" This ain't gonna be a walk in the p=
ark.  Whoever's out there really knows what they're do'n.  Like some sorta =
master tactician, with a dangerously high level of intelligence.  And at th=
e same time they're strong enough ta even topple the big guns on both sides=
. "

Straight Shot paces back and forth a few times.  She had once done som=
e research with Tucson while visiting an archive center on Cybertron.  It n=
ow began to seem slightly familiar to something she might have read.  

" H=
ey, now that ya mention that Rattrap, Tucson and I were just passing time o=
ne day at an old archive center on Cybertron and he found something on tact=
ical dictators of the past, simply by chance.  One particular article told =
a story about a certain dictator who was far more ruthless than any Decepti=
con/ Predacon leader combined.  It was rumored that he may have had connect=
ions to Unicron himself.  But these are rumors and I don't know if they're =
true.  Fact is, the patterns of carnage, abduction and confusion that we're=
 all experiencing now, it matches with what happened when that article was =
released.  Only problem is, there was never a name mentioned."

Quickstride=
 scratches behind his neck in bewilderment.

" Um so why can't we find anyo=
ne who went AWOL?  How the heck did they just fall off the edge of the plan=
et?  That all part of it too?"

Straight Shot shrugs.

" I'm just as confus=
ed as you are but it could be." I wish we had a way to scan for alien energ=
y signatures, I bet my butt quills that's part of the answer we all happen =
ta be looking for."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep =
28, 2011, at 12:20 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> T=
he shuttle finally landed inside the Ark landing bay, the is a slight
> jos=
tling at the last moment as the shuttle actually touched down, but
> not en=
ough to cause any undue discomfort.
> 
> "Alright!" POLAR CLAW said from th=
e front seat. "Let's unload and get
> the wounded to the medbay!"
> 
> POLA=
R CLAW's voice was all authority and command as he stepped out of
> the coc=
kpit area and into the section where NIGHTSHIFT and the rest
> were seated,=
 and it was immediately obvious that POLAR CLAW himself
> was in need of me=
dical care or a CR chamber or both. Long gashed went
> down his frame, foll=
owed by burnt marks and places where he had been
> sliced.
> 
> However he =
didn't seem to even feel it as he looked at WOLFGANG,
> NIGHTSHIFT and RAMU=
LUS, "Wolfgang, get inside and lets get this ship
> repaired, on the double=
. Ramulus, you get Nightshift to the medical
> bay."
> 
> "The same could b=
e said for you." PROWL said as he too exited the
> cockpit section of the s=
hip. He also had taken a few slashes and
> burns, but not nearly to the ext=
ent that POLAR CLAW had.
> 
> POLAR CLAW grunted, "Later. First we have a m=
ission to complete."
> 
> ---------------------------------
> 
> Meanwhile =
OUTSIDE the shuttle on the ARk bay floor, TORCA and the
> other fuzors, alo=
ng with RAT TRAP and STRAIGHT shot had watched the
> shuttle come in and co=
uld see the landing gear crumple as the ship
> touched down and the ship ru=
mble to a stop.
> 
> "Judging by the ship they are probrably going to need =
some help."
> SANTON said as he looked on.
> 
> WINGCALIBER nodded as he wa=
tched the shuttle ramp extended and the
> door opened, the sound of orders =
being given coming from inside, it
> sounded like POLAR CLAW.
> 
> (TAG)
> =

> Preston
>

      <p>The shutt=
le finally landed inside the Ark landing bay, the is a slight<br>
jostling =
at the last moment as the shuttle actually touched down, but<br>
not enough=
 to cause any undue discomfort.<br>
<br>
"Alright!" POLAR CLAW said from th=
e front seat. "Let's unload and get<br>
the wounded to the medbay!"<br>
<br=
>
POLAR CLAW's voice was all authority and command as he stepped out of<br>=

the cockpit area and into the section where NIGHTSHIFT and the rest<br>
we=
re seated, and it was immediately obvious that POLAR CLAW himself<br>
was i=
n need of medical care or a CR chamber or both. Long gashed went<br>
down h=
is frame, followed by burnt marks and places where he had been<br>
sliced.<=
br>
<br>
However he didn't seem to even feel it as he looked at WOLFGANG,<b=
r>
NIGHTSHIFT and RAMULUS, "Wolfgang, get inside and lets get this ship<br>=

repaired, on the double. Ramulus, you get Nightshift to the medical<br>
ba=
y."<br>
<br>
"The same could be said for you." PROWL said as he too exited =
the<br>
cockpit section of the ship. He also had taken a few slashes and<br=
>
burns, but not nearly to the extent that POLAR CLAW had.<br>
<br>
POLAR C=
LAW grunted, "Later. First we have a mission to complete."<br>
<br>
-------=
--------------------------<br>
<br>
Meanwhile OUTSIDE the shuttle on the AR=
k bay floor, TORCA and the<br>
other fuzors, along with RAT TRAP and STRAIG=
HT shot had watched the<br>
shuttle come in and could see the landing gear =
crumple as the ship<br>
touched down and the ship rumble to a stop.<br>
<br=
>
"Judging by the ship they are probrably going to need some help."<br>
SAN=
TON said as he looked on.<br>
<br>
WINGCALIBER nodded as he watched the shu=
ttle ramp extended and the<br>
door opened, the sound of orders being given=
 coming from inside, it<br>
sounded like POLAR CLAW.<br>
